desc: We sell homemade wreaths, centerpieces, garland, etc for each holiday, including Halloween! Once you take a peek of our homemade items you will have no choice but to buy!

layout.text: We have been designing custom handmade wreaths for your front doors since 2019, shortly after losing my biggest cheerleader, my Grandma. I discovered my passion for crafting after trying to find a unique item to decorate with. Our most popular deco mesh wreaths are Fall wreaths, Summer wreaths, Spring wreaths, Halloween wreaths and Christmas wreaths. All are available for immediate shipping!
